content:
This is an issue that only Zulip mods / admins here may run into, but just in case the friendly folks from Zulip are still regularly checking this stream: when trying to reorder our linkifiers (specifically, trying to move #queue up towards the top of the list), I keep running into the error "Save failed: The ordered list must enumerate all existing linkifiers exactly once".
Screenshot 2024-09-29 at 16.48.40.png

I'm guessing this is something out of my control? I'm on Firefox 130.0.1 on macOS, if it matters.
Thanks for the report! I'll pass it on.
Does this happen for you with just that linkifier, or others as well?

It happened for a few of them, and it wasn't always consistent (i.e. I could sometimes get the re-ordering to work by exiting the settings page and then trying again). If it helps, I can try and copy and paste the linkifiers we have, but I'm guessing you guys can get them from the backend in an easier way...
When this happens, does reloading the app fix it for you?
No, it doesn't unfortunately. I just tried reloading the page and moving some linkifiers around and I got the same error.
